name: Clean Wide Orange
description: Looks identical to the default orange skin but with the added comfort of a widescreen skin. Also hides banners and ads and cleans up the font.
additional_info:
V 1.3: now even wider! No more extras except widescreen, removal of banners/ads and cleaned up font. Namechange to reflect this.

Tip:
Use Adblock Plus to remove all ads for an even cleaner look. It's a browser extension for Firefox, Chrome, etc. Google it!

Credits:
Golden Circle for codes to remove banners & ads.
Dream for the code to change the font.
